-d.option: /path/to/output/folder  -> Where to store processed data, default [ /tmp ]

-u.option: Switch to toggle whether or not to upload processed data to firebase database

-i.option: /path/to/inputfile -> Name of file contianing datadump from NOBIL, default [ $PWD/nobil_db_dump ]

-p.option: foo_ -> Prefix for outpufiles, default [ ToFirebase_ ]

-h.option: This program process previously downloaded database dump from NOBIL, into JSON structure and optionally upload the structure to firebase database used by for LadeApp
